line.comment: * ZH 2.0 - from now on this script only handles the completion of a planetary terraforming project.
* Update planet table. -1 is in progress, 1 is terraformed.
* update amount of currently ongoing planet projects
* unique planet bonus gets applied first
* ZH 2.0 - every planet gives also gives a generic bonus which improves all sector stats by 25%
* Herobetty 5.3: Check if standard version or enhanced version. Standard population effect gives +20 pops; enhanced gives +30 and pop growth.
* $outpost = find station: sector=$sector class or type={Player Outpost} race=[Player] flags=0 refobj=null maxdist=0 maxnum=1 refpos=null
* Herobetty 5.3: Check if standard version or enhanced version. Standard support effect gives +2 station support; enhanced gives +4.
* Repair+ (enhanced version) gives 2 station support slots.
* Herobetty 5.3: Check if standard version or enhanced version. Standard research effect gives +30% research rate; enhanced gives +60%.
* Add-Ons 1.2: Terraforming 25 planets will give you the hidden terraforming mastery perk, applied throughout your empire (see ZH.Terraforming.Get.Limit and ZH.Terraforming.Get.Penalty.Global)
* Mastery improves your global limit. It reduces the number of planets by 1. For example, if it took 4 planets to support 1 additional project across your empire, it will now take 3 planets.

sval.val: ZH 2.0 - from now on this script only handles the completion of a planetary terraforming project.
Update planet table. -1 is in progress, 1 is terraformed.
update amount of currently ongoing planet projects
unique planet bonus gets applied first
ZH 2.0 - every planet gives also gives a generic bonus which improves all sector stats by 25%
Herobetty 5.3: Check if standard version or enhanced version. Standard population effect gives +20 pops; enhanced gives +30 and pop growth.
$outpost = find station: sector=$sector class or type={Player Outpost} race=[Player] flags=0 refobj=null maxdist=0 maxnum=1 refpos=null
Herobetty 5.3: Check if standard version or enhanced version. Standard support effect gives +2 station support; enhanced gives +4.
Repair+ (enhanced version) gives 2 station support slots.
Herobetty 5.3: Check if standard version or enhanced version. Standard research effect gives +30% research rate; enhanced gives +60%.
Add-Ons 1.2: Terraforming 25 planets will give you the hidden terraforming mastery perk, applied throughout your empire (see ZH.Terraforming.Get.Limit and ZH.Terraforming.Get.Penalty.Global)
Mastery improves your global limit. It reduces the number of planets by 1. For example, if it took 4 planets to support 1 additional project across your empire, it will now take 3 planets.
